channel.title: LLM on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in LLM on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: These psychological tricks can get LLMs to respond to “forbidden” prompts
item.description: Study shows how patterns in LLM training data can lead to “parahuman” responses.

item.title: With new in-house models, Microsoft lays the groundwork for independence from OpenAI
item.description: Microsoft is still deeply tied to OpenAI, but who knows what the future holds.

item.title: US executive branch agencies will use ChatGPT Enterprise for just $1 per agency
item.description: Questions linger about ideological bias in models as well as data security.

item.title: Developer survey shows trust in AI coding tools is falling as usage rises
item.description: “AI solutions that are almost right, but not quite” lead to more debugging work.
